item.title: 562 theiving
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

Ok so I am having some trouble with this code and I have been searching for an answer for about 3 days now. I’ve searched google,mopar,runesvr,runelcs, bing, yahoo ect… I’ve even tried fixing it myself but it still did not work. So Ill explain my problem. Ok, so my theiving stalls are messed up, and what I mean by this is that when you click on the stall it only give one GP I am trying to make it so you get more then 1 gp but I still can’t find out how. So please Help. The code is below.

	case -31154:
		p.thief(995, 4, 50, 1700, "You steal some money.");
		break;
	case -31153:
		p.thief(995, 4, 1, 1900, "You steal some money.");
		break;
	case -31152:
		p.thief(995, 4, 50, 2000, "You steal some money.");
		break;
	case -31151:
		p.thief(995, 4, 75, 1500, "You steal some money.");
		break;
	case -31149:
		p.thief(995, 4, 35, 700, "You steal some money.");
		break;
	case -31150:
		p.thief(995, 4, 65, 1000, "You steal some money.");
		break;
